reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Bought as a gift for my boyfriend. He threw the packaging away before activation. Couldn't get it to activate. call straight talk and they said it wasn't scanned out before shipping. So now we have this new phone we can't get activated due to not having the packaging

reviews.title: Very Irritated and unhappy!
reviews.review_text: I bought this phone for my son who is in a halfway house in Mansfield, ohio .It was supposed to be delivered from Walmart. Then I get a message saying it is out of stock and would have to be shipped. Drove an hour and dropped it off to him. He tried to add the minutes I bought but they couldn't activate the phone because no one scanned the phone before they shipped it. Got a run around and theysaid you will hav to take it back to Walmart to return it and get a new one. This is completely unacceptable. I am furious.

reviews.title: Walmart customer service is horrid!
reviews.review_text: Of course nobody can scan the phone before selling to me. Straight tells you to go back to the store you purchased it from %26 these people had no idea what to do %26 tell me there was no managers in the store?! Thankfully Walmart.com refunded me for my purchase

reviews.title: Not great so far...
reviews.review_text: When we brought it home, something was wrong with the phone. It will not activate. So when we go back "into town" ,(we live in rural Kansas,) we will have to exchange the phone. So we will still have no phone for the next two days. At that point I hope to add some 🌟🌟🌟 To be continued...

once I got the phone I couldn't activate it I had to return it to the store and get a new phone and then that phone speaker was blown I had to get another phone which I had to wait for them to get because they didn't have any after 2 weeks I finally got the phone to work and so far it's been a decent phone

reviews.title: needs to be activated at a store still
reviews.review_text: dont bother buying this online. you still have to take it into a store for them to activate at the register. Bought this and didnt realize that. Christmas morning came and my daughter couldnt activate the phone to use. now we need to go into a store to get it activated.

reviews.title: Unable to activate when bought online
reviews.review_text: The phones have to be scanned at register when bought in order to add minutes to them. Otherwise straight talk cannot tell if the phone was bought or stolen. Taking it back to the local store cannot fix this. They can only return the item or replace it. In my case this phone was not available and could only trans it for a diffrent phone which still cost $2 more after returning it. Do not recommend buying phones online from Walmart.

reviews.title: Warning
reviews.review_text: Absolutely do not waste your money purchasing this online. Ordered one for a friend and after receiving was unable to activate and told to take to store to activate to then be told it was impossible they don't do that so asked to return and told NOPE just a complete waste of money

reviews.title: SUPPLIER PAY ATTENTION!!! SCAN BEFORE SHIPPING!!!
reviews.review_text: This StraightTalk Phone was a good deal, however, because the supplier who sold me this phone online, didn't remember to scan the cell phone before shipping it so the phone is useless. I had to drive to a Walmart, (I was trying to avoid having to go to a Walmart, hence while I purchased online,) they didn't have the same phone. I had to end up getting a refund instead. It was a waste of my time and now I have to wait several days before my debit card is refunded! Pay attention %26 make sure electronics %26 phones are scanned before shipping! Thanks
I would only purchase this phone for talking, but not for anything else. It isn't capable memory wise of anything else...
I cannot activate my phone because my phone was not scan when I ordered this phone now I can't activate my phone I'm very irritated

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
reviews.review_text: worst phone ive ever had. trying to use the LTE network in a 5g world is HORRIBLE!!!! Screen freezes all the time. battery sucks

reviews.title: Nokia phone
reviews.review_text: Can't activate the phone I spent my money on that is needed desperately bad. I'm on a small fixed income and had to cut my budget some other place in order to afford this phone. now I wasted my money on a product that is unusable.

reviews.title: rip off
reviews.review_text: don't know if this is a good phone or not since Walmart mailed it to me without scanning it so I can't use it, they won't refund my money, and want to charge me for it again

reviews.title: phones are great but!
reviews.review_text: i ordered the phones and they came in a timley manner howerver when i went to activate them it says it isnt enabled to activate because the barcodes were not scanned! there for i have two tablets not phones and im very frustrated about this situation.

reviews.title: stuff happens
reviews.review_text: i had a seizure when was in my pocket and the phone had not broken from the fall. It stopped working i think because of my body hitting the ground. would not work after i was back up three or four hours later. should of bought warranty. my mistake.

reviews.title: not happy
reviews.review_text: I ordered two of the phones off the Wal-Mart website I tried to activate them today and it would not let me. I called the number on the card inside the box and both phones are listed as stolen. They told me to take the phones to Wal-Mart with the receipt and they would have to scan them threw the register so i can activate them. Would not recommend buying any phone from the Walmart website.

reviews.title: came unscanned so cant activate
reviews.review_text: got this phone for a gift for my daughter but called to activate it and said it wasnt scanned at register even though it was a online order, but the store locally cant scan it either. Cant return it bc i bought it and had it wrapped so by the time it got opened it was past the return deadline. Thanks walmart

reviews.title: Worst pay as you go phone EVER
reviews.review_text: Purchased this phone as a temporary phone for a friend who had lost her phone and just needed something to get her by. Paid for just the least expensive plan which did come with data. However, she had Wi-Fi in her home so she was running off Wi-Fi majority of the time for some reason she could not access social medias at all she could not send or receive pictures at all even with their least expensive plan it should've allowed this I called and double checked with the company they said it should, and for some reason it would not work at all. Their customer service was terrible as with most companies their customer service is based out of another country which is fine however, she couldn't even reach them at all. Every time she tried to call I would have to call from my phone she could not use 611 nor could she call their 800 number I do not recommend straight talk at all nor do I recommend this phone. Worst purchase I've made in a long time save your money it's a waste..

reviews.title: Scan Error
reviews.review_text: I am unable to activate this device due to a "scan error" at the Walmart store it was delivered from. I am going to have to take the phone back into the srore to have this resolved. In the meantime, I am losing air time I have already purchased through Straight Talk at no fault of my own.

reviews.title: Walmart deliverd a stolen phone
reviews.review_text: I would love to give a review of the phone but since I was unable to use it because it was an unscanned unverified phone essentially stolen I was unable to do so in the process I sent 7 hours on the phone being mocked enduring sarcasm from agent and supervisors at Walmart customer service center being hung up on multiple times promise I will help you and that never happened hung up on transferred to people who couldn't help me who have no idea what I was talking about ending up in tears being told to take Ubers to get this phone taken care of because they just couldn't help me that's my review

reviews.title: Phone can't be activated not scanned properly.
reviews.review_text: I bought the phone online from the store website to be delivered in 75 minutes or less. The phone arrived on time but when I went to Straight Talk website to activate it I was told It couldn't be activated because it wasn't properly scanned and I would have to go back to the store and get it rescinded.

reviews.title: Not able to add
reviews.review_text: Per Straight Talk unable to activate phone to add minutes because Walmart did not scan correctly at check out. knowin issue. Returned phone, but beware there is only a 14 day returm on the phone. You have to call in to get a refund on the card, they will not do so at customer service. DO NOT RECOMMRND

reviews.title: Its not worth it!
reviews.review_text: You will not be able to activate the phone. If you buy a phone from the website, they do not scan it before shipping. If you try taking it the actual Walmart store, they refuse to scan it because it was purchased online and not in the store. You're basically buying a phone you'll never be able to use. Better off buying it from the store where they actually scan the phone.

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.review_text: I bought this phone for my cousin went and picked it up mailed it with some other stuff from home only for him to get it on christmas eve and walmart didnt even scan the phone so he has a locked phone that he has no way of using and mins he cant add onto now he has to see if the walmart where he lives in a different state will scan the phone for him so he can use it
I need to know can I return this phone back because I do not need it
The phone was terrible after 35 days it didn't work

reviews.title: Phone not working
reviews.review_text: Called straight talk can't activate this phone

reviews.title: not scanned
reviews.review_text: picked up my order and tried to activate the phone only to have straight talk tell me the store didnt scan the phone in

reviews.title: very poor service
reviews.review_text: when trying to activate the phone we was told that they was never scanned properly therefore we will have to do a return in order to get them activated

reviews.title: Slow. Weak.
reviews.review_text: It's an extremely basic phone that is even slower with no storage room for what you want because of the apps that come on it that not everyone wants or use. It sucks. But it's cheap so it's why I bought it.
I like the phone, but after it got scanned and try activate it there asking to pay for new plan? Make sure u get a new phone, when u do don't get one's with sim cards, there no no.

reviews.title: Stolen?
reviews.review_text: I ordered delivery for this phone and the person that shopped for me didn't scan it so I couldn't activate it.. the carrier said it was “stolen”. I have Walmart delivery and got it delivered how is it “stolen”?

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.review_text: The phone was never scanned i got stuck with the phone and no phone number when i opened the phone box there was a $30 dollar phone card under the phone scratched off so I'm out of money and no one wants to replace the phone or money

How is scanning a phone so difficult to remember? Every time? You'd think 18 an hour %26 people getting mad about this issue you'd resolve it. Paying 10 extra for express for an emergency just to have to return this myself. Enough already

I got a phone that is no good at all I just paid for it and I can't do in then weth it there told me that I could not get it turned on so they go my money I just look at it that is all I can do I am not happy at all

Bought a phone straight from the box no resale, curbside. I could not activate the phone because it claims it was never purchased (stolen). The other phone I purchased had a bad SIM card. Will be returning both.

I bought this straight talk phone and minutes along with it and the phone can't even be activated because straight talk says y'all didn't scan it right so I guess I want a refund back for the phone and everything

reviews.title: Unusable phone!
reviews.review_text: I ordered it online for my daughter's birthday, and I picked it up from the store. Though I can't activate the device because the worker never scanned the phone into Walmarts system, and they act like I stole it or something.

reviews.title: it not let me activate my password
reviews.review_text: They said I need to bring it back to the store or someone to come and get it and re ring it up. Because it's not registering in the system for the s DMI number.

reviews.title: phone can not be activated properly
reviews.review_text: can npt activate phone. bought as Christmas gift for my son, and he just got his allowance to activate his ohone on my existing account after being a customer for 7 years and having multiple lines.

reviews.title: Good phone, bad store
reviews.review_text: Great deal, only if ordered online. But if you order online, these walmart mungs won't scan it properly and then you can't activate it without going in anyway. Just cut the online deals if you have to go in anyway! Terrible.
Don't buy it from Walmart! It's useless I can't even get it activated it's only works for WiFi Thats IT even when you take it to Walmart it's a lie they can't help you at Walmart

reviews.title: waste of money
reviews.review_text: i went through online grocery pickup and when i tried activating the phone it wouldnt work and i went back to walmart and spoke to a staff member and learned that there was a scanning issue and i have to return the phine and get a new one

reviews.title: Horrendous
reviews.review_text: Phone was not scanned properly, so couldn't be activated. Was made to go in store to fix %26 no one in store knew how to handle. Took over an hour %26 a half to resolve %26 even then, not fully resolved.
Tried to activate the phone, only to find out that I need to go back due to it not being properly scanned and will not activate. 80 mile round trip times two. Not happy at all!

reviews.title: Worst experience
reviews.review_text: This phone doesn't work at all…tried to go back to Walmart to see if they could've solved my problem with this phone but they couldn't. Worst experience ever and this was a gift for someone

I hate going to the store and now I've got to was setting it up and it wouldn't. I tried for help they said it wasn't scanned properly at the store so now I've got to go to the store

reviews.title: electronics
reviews.review_text: went to pick up two pre paid for, new phones. items not scanned correctly and unable to activate items. unfortunately unable to set up service now with out going back and forth to and from Walmart store. associates please pay attention and understand people time is valuable and cell service is crucial with phone purchases.

reviews.title: HORRIBLE
reviews.review_text: Couldn't set up my phone because the employees didn't scan it out properly. I try to call and set it up and it looks like it was stolen in their system because someone failed to properly do their job. Bought a whole phone that is now useless, bought it online, it was shipped to me for free but someone didn't do something right and now I just have a piece of plastic that still cost me money and I still need a phone. This is ridiculous. I'd give zero stars if I could.
